name: 資訊教育研究法
description: 本課程主要目標在探討資訊教育研究的本質與相關理論，訂定研究問題與進行文獻分析，研究報告的撰寫，以及相關研究法，包括問卷調查、觀察研究、實驗研究、相關研究、行動研究、與質性研究等等。期使學習者能熟悉資訊教育研究的概念，並運用於其論文之撰寫。
goals: 10.　介紹資訊教育研究的相關理論基礎
11.　學習各種資訊教育的研究方法
12.　熟悉研究法信效度的判準
13.　培養獨立研究、批判思考的基本能力
14.　能撰寫研究計畫與報告
15.　能評析各種資訊教育研究報告
syllabus:
Week 1: Course introduction, Share your research topics (if you have)

Week 2: knowing research process , quantitative research, and qualitative research

Week 3: Experimental designs

Week 4: Correlational designs, Survey designs

Week 5: Grounded theory designs, Ethnographic designs

Week 6: Narrative designs, Mixed-methods designs

Week 7: Action research designs

Week 8: Identify your research topics (Homework 1)

Week 9: Review related literature (Homework 2)

Week 10: Specify research purpose, questions and/or hypotheses (Homework 3)

Week 11: Collect, Analyze, and Interpret data (Homework 4)

Week 12: Write research report (paper) (Homework 5, 6)

Week 13: Write a research proposal (for thesis) (Homework 7)

Week 14, 15: Paper presentation (including PowerPoint file)

Week 16, 17: Proposal presentation (using DOC format)

Week 18: Review and Reflect

methodologies.note: 每一章都有instructor自製的PowerPoint slides，　每一次上課的步驟都一樣：（１） show該章的自我評量題目（英文），逐一要求學生回答、並提問、討論；（２）lecture, show PowerPoint slides, 並以Tablet PC直接mark and annotate；（３）實作方面，要求學生share，如口頭分享研究領域、分享研究工具等。 這門課針對研究生的論文研究，目的之一是協助學生解決論文研究歷程中的問題。

grading.note: H1 (10): identify a “small” (highly-focused & clear-cut) ICT integration, e-learning or CSE research problem. Write “Statement of the Problem”, with good Chinese title and English title, one page only. H2 (20): Review of highly-related empirical studies. 4 research papers, must be empirical, English, journal, after 2008, different authors, different journals, electronic. Hand in electronic papers (will be collected). Use thematic review, less than 2 pages, references counted. H3 (5): Research purposes and hypotheses (or research questions), less than one page. H4 (15): research methods (participants, instruments, procedure, data collection techniques, data analysis techniques), less than 2 pages. H5 (15): Results (or findings) (Analysis and Interpretations, or Analysis and Discussion), less than 2 pages.  H6 (10): Paper writing (English Journal paper style, 4~5 pages, references counted. APA format) （含報告） RP (15): Proposal writing (a brief proposal, must be a new research problem, that is, must be different from your H homework). 3~4 pages. (in Chinese only) （含報告） CP (10): Class Participation(出席、參與)
